company.title: Developer Experience Engineer
details: Designed developer and implemented developer tools that increased adoption by 200%.
Mentored community developers through implementing with the Ceramic Network enabling projects to be launched rapidly and successfully.
Collaborated with multiple teams to ensure that documentation was understandable and referenceable.

company.title: Full-Stack Engineer
details: Implemented Natural Language processing that improved performance by 90% and increased parsed data accuracy by 50%.
Coordinated a team of developers through optimizing user acquisition and leveraging a smart cache that ensured data was only requested when strictly necessary.
Engineered extensions to enable employers to use tilr products in their currently existing website with minimal effort.

company.title: Full-Stack Engineer
details: Coordinated with organization wide language specific teams that established organization norms and ensured maximum growth potential.
Created and designed unopinionated packages that accelerated development and standardized error handling and logging while enabling advanced error tracking by leveraging AWS X-Ray.
Communicated with external companies to develop an in-house boilerplate for commonly requested extensions like Intuit's Quickbooks.

company.title: Full-Stack Engineer | Contract
details: Led a cross-functional team that dismantled the monolith style codebase into a front-end and backend enabling specialists to operate without worrying about repercussions.
Established organization wide practices that enabled performance tracking metrics, reduced missed deadlines by 80% and improved communication across every team.
Architected and implemented flexible integrations with Google Calendar and Office 365 to automate calendar management and appointment creation.
